name: tm34
effect: Teaches Shock Wave to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sludge Wave to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Shock Wave Gen II: Swagger Gen I: Bide)

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user strikes the foe with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.
flavor_text.platinum: The user strikes the foe with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user strikes the foe with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.
